mapper.select: create table IF NOT EXISTS tbl_users ( username varchar(15) PRIMARY KEY, password varchar(255) NOT NULL, u_name varchar(20) NOT NULL, u_nickname varchar(20), u_tel varchar(15), u_role varchar(15) NOT NULL )
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_users (username, password, u_name, u_nickname, u_tel, u_role) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{u_name}, #{u_nickname}, #{u_tel}, #{u_role} )
